projects.name: Movie App
projects.description: React app that makes calls to the The Movie DB API to get information about the movies and TV shows (what a shocker :D). Allows you to login using your own MDTB account and update your account within the app.

projects.name: Bundles Web App
projects.description: Laravel/Vue.js that will allow users to create their account and purchase products (bundles). I am planing to create cart functionality that will use Stripe for getting payments. Another neat functionality that I want to add is - Admin side, where users who are admins can manage inventory. I have started working on it, however it will take time to finish. Please check Github repo to see some code!

projects.name: Project 3
projects.description: Have an idea? Let me know!!!
